title: 169 - How is the Old Testament Authoritative for Jesus Followers -- With Tim Mackie
description:
Tim Mackie of the Bible Project joins us for one of the best conversations about the Old Testament I've had. This is such good stuff.

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
